entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
